title: Batman at Boyce: The Finale
overview: Batman faces his new nemesis: THE QUOTER in this thrilling culmination of Batman at Boyce.
tagline: The road to Justice ends here….

title: Christmas Delivery
overview: A woman, a gambler, and a burglar. Their Christmas adventures unfurl in three stories that resourcefuly trip back and forth in time.

title: Get Bossy
overview: In this stoner detective comedy, a cannabis loving female private eye partners with a bitter former CIA officer to uncover a conspiracy and bring down a larger-than-life corporate villain.

title: Eviction Notice
overview: A group of dysfunctional housemates lives are thrown into chaos when they discover that their landlord has been brutally murdered - and that one of them might be responsible.
tagline: Living the american nightmare

title: Night Walk
overview: Kate finds herself lost and followed in a foreign city. Despite her attempts to communicate the city reflects her own fear and alienation back at her.

title: Revenge Is Blind
overview: Ralph, a veteran hitman is assigned to a high profile target by a feared mob boss, Beto Francis. As the job closes in, he is forced to confront a moral crossroads that could shatter his world.
tagline: Loyalty Runs Deep, Blood Runs Deeper

title: The Haters
overview: A downbeat detective takes on a case, which leads him to a nihilistic cult that challenges his beliefs.
tagline: What a sick joke...

title: Worth
overview: A woman reflects back on heist she conducted with her partner.

title: Full Clip for a Snitch
overview: Convicted drug dealers set up another dealer, Deion, in exchange for their freedom, but when Deion’s mother finds out, she sets out on a mission to kill the people who snitched on her son.

title: Degradation
overview: A Psychological Crime Thriller that deals with trauma, sorrow, rage, and revenge. Nancy is mentally losing her self and giving into her dark thoughts as she contemplates murdering the "friend" who assaulted her, as her mind tears apart from the loss of who she was.

title: Mindvolution 2046
overview: The crisis-ridden period of Generation Z has resulted in legislation requiring practically all people to have a chip implanted in their brains in order to exchange their emotions with one another. to feel satisfied after eating, to substitute food, to the point of sharing delight and suffering till having sex alleviates the problem of lack of permission  "Ann" continues to stand and market herself using her physical appearance. Even if the future is sophisticated, humans still want to have sex. Why is she still prostitute in the old style?
tagline: A mysterious client that will take her to a new dimension.

title: River of Salvation
overview: Rong, living in a small town in the south of China, is a pedicure therapist who has never gotten married. She has a brother named Xiaodong , who is 14 years younger. Xiaodong is almost 18 years old, instead of working he plays video games all day long, but after going through a series of things he finally becomes independent. And Seeing this, Rong returned to her hometown in the northeast of China, and went to the police station, confessing that she killed a person 19 years ago. However,the following development of the matter is going to be out of Rong's expectation.

title: Chhadke 2.0
overview: Family of Mendog is killed by Gangsters of Manang while collecting Yarsagumba, but he lives to plot his vengence.
tagline: Bhyaguta haina, Mendog vann.

title: Invisible Cop
overview: Storm (Typhoon Kanokchat Manyaon), a young police officer who resigned from the agency. and immersed himself in the past mistakes One night, he receives a message from his former commander to return to work for the nation in a secret unit known as the "Black Pigeon", but the caveat is that he must become an anonymous person who no longer exists.

title: Knots & Numbskulls
overview: When a power struggle for CEO position came upon. A corrupt executive plots a payback against his rival with two clumsy kidnappers, Ignites chaos and unexpected outcomes.

title: Mahogany
overview: Mo, a young woman growing up in the trenches of an urban neighborhood, faces drugs, crime, violence, and poverty. All become driving factors that will test Mo's decision to rise above her circumstances as danger grows beyond her control.
tagline: Destiny is not a matter of change, it's a matter of choice.

title: Free Kazoid
overview: An average encounter with Canadian police.
tagline: Have you ever had to deal with Canadians?

title: Minor Inconvenience
overview: A mafia satire following Don Chergoli Maflipapia (Alex L.), Lorenzo (Nate L.), and DiLorenzo (Spencer J.) as they scheme to maintain power. At the same time, Agent 46 (S. Francis) spies from the air vent and reports their findings back to HQ (Chris M.).
tagline: Oh, you've GOTTA see this!

title: Pitha 23:23
overview: The story is about how a deaf and mute ten-year-old boy rescues a kidnapped business tycoon and his older sister in a festival crowd.

title: The Last Turn
overview: A Los Angeles detective is brought in to investigate a suspicious suicide. The huge secret he uncovers behind the case threatens to end his career - and his life - in this action-packed crime thriller.

title: No Turning Back
overview: A young man in Jamaica battles with taking matters into his own hands when seeking justice for the murder of his mother.
tagline: For every choice there is a consequence!

title: Judgement
overview: One year after a fateful murder has taken place. Gary Courtney finds himself playing the part of Judge, Jury, and Executioner after he tracks down the assailant of said murder, Chris Lawson.

title: When I Break
overview: A young man escapes into the woods to reflect on his inner turmoil.

title: Darius Lockwood and the Murder For Truth
overview: A victorian Detective and his faithful companion must solve a murder, but in doing so they uncover a much deeper, darker secret.
tagline: The game is on when Detective Lockwood uncovers more than just a perp

title: The Sun and Shade
overview: A gripping exploration of morality, class divide, and the human condition. The film follows the story of an upper class family from Florida, whose life is turned upside down when they receive a ransom demand for their son. What begins as a tale of a kidnapping soon evolves into a tense examination of societal contrasts as the family grapples with the decision to sacrifice their fortune to save a child. A narrative that dives into the complexities of human nature, showcasing both the heights of selflessness and the depths of greed.

title: Crabs In A Bucket
overview: 'Crabs In A Bucket', a feature film created by a three man team (Justyce Padilla, Nate Wilburn, and Sebastian Saavedra); is about Andy and Anthony. Two men connected by a dark past that run a scam cleaning service to steal from unsuspecting customers.

title: Candle Cops
overview: When a gold candle stick goes missing from the convent, all hell breaks loose. But no-one seems to care about the snuffed out candle left behind. Until Detective Joe arrives on the scene.

title: Baby Powder
overview: Laying low from robbing banks, the Prima Donnas look to their next spot, a local diner, with hopes of skating off with a bag full of cash.

title: The Deep Truth
overview: A day in a life of a murderer...

title: Bloody Milk
overview: A lonely man drinks his glass of milk every day in the courtyard. One day, however, everything changes...
tagline: And the banana greets us daily

title: Going Cold
overview: After aspiring detective Tucker Jensen is expelled from university, an old friend goes missing. He investigates the case, willing to go to any lengths to prove himself worthy of reinstatement.
tagline: Someone’s gotta do the dirty work.

title: Cherrywood
overview: A late-night break-in at a suburban Seattle home sparks a twisted power struggle between the trespasser and the home's lone occupant.

title: The Honor of the Filthy
overview: After the brutal murder of Damien's family he begins to seek out revenge on the man responsible.
tagline: revenge tastes good, but is it healthy?

title: Muted Canary
overview: A rookie detective, Cylus, partners with Ray, Cylus' father in law, to learn the ropes of being a cop. They get along and quickly build a trusted partnership. While out on a call, Cylus witnesses Ray's involvement in the killing of a suspect who was compliant and cooperating. Cylus now must decide what to do, report Ray to internal affairs or take the blue code of silence.

title: God City Da Movie
overview: In the cold streets of Charlotte, where murder is on the rise, a drug deal gone wrong has now created a who done it in the city with the cops chasing the city's notorious Thugs.

title: Backscratcher in: The Case of the Missing Face
overview: Private detective Scratch Baxter is eager to solve a grisly stolen identity case and re-establish his career. But will he be upstaged by hotshot city cop Barry Solvit?
tagline: There's more than one way to lose face.

title: The Hound
overview: A short film follows a dog’s journey through a park as they encounter something sinister.
tagline: The Hound

title: Uma de Raffa
overview: In a fishing village, The employees of Uma de Raffa, a nearly bankrupt resort, are getting anxious. However, a visit from the resort investor brings new hope. The situation suddenly gets complicated when said investor instantly dies from a heart attack.

title: Family First
overview: A wife is murdered, a daughter disappears, and the lives of three adopted brothers fall apart. Months later, everyone has moved on but the youngest brother, Keeno Marshall, who moves mountains to try to find his presumed dead daughter.
tagline: Others chose to move on. He chose to move mountains.

title: Ek Haseena Thi
overview: A renowned singer plans to kill his own wife, since he is frustrated by her attitude and to get the insurance money. He plans this with the hotel manager which they visit during their vacation. He promised the manager to give 10% of the total money. The wife calls the manager and tips her to have sex with her husband.
tagline: Do not underestimate anyone

title: Zugzwang
overview: Two strangers meet at a slipway, but their exchange does not go according to plan...
tagline: Your Move

title: Bad Cop, no Donut
overview: After a number of donut related robberies occur, Dorman and his co-worker, Dean, are tasked with discovering this donut bandit. However, the culprit seems to be under their noses.
tagline: What happens when you steal a donut...

title: The Pretenders
overview: A terminally ill taxi driver finds himself in a dangerous situation during what seems to be a normal overnight order.

title: Schuld und Urteil
overview: The interrogation of a murder suspect by the police officer goes in the wrong direction and reveals deep secrets.
tagline: Who is really lying?

title: Losers of Eden
overview: 3 storylines, each a different genre: drama, action, comedy. As a young teenager plots her escape from a run-down motel, three killers-for-hire hunt for their rightful reward after an assignment. Meanwhile, two knuckleheads attempt to solve a sudden and mysterious murder.

title: District Queens
overview: "Queen of the city", Racine, has helped her neighborhood succeed, but her daughters may destroy it all.
tagline: They will have to fight to stay on top.

title: Women Without Men
overview: Italy 1965. Marcello, a middle-class man, decides to spend the night with a prostitute. He gets in touch with a luxurious brothel managed by a very strict owner with draconian rules. Among multiple women introduced to him he chooses Bice, a young woman in her early twenties. After their sexual intercourse the bedroom’s phone rings.
tagline: Every beloved object is the center of a paradise.

title: ملاكي دمنهور
overview: Three Friends Find Their Friend Killed , But It Seems Like A Big Conspiracy And Everyone Is Suspected
tagline: Damanhour, Private

title: One-2
overview: Two detectives, Hart and Johnson, work alongside local hustler Tae & G. They have similar personalities, but work on opposite sides of the law. While working to take down HeavyHand, a local kingpin, Hart finds himself at the mercy of another known gangster, and find himself working with Tae & G to bring them down.
tagline: Two sides of the same coin.

title: Breach
overview: Two people fight for survival in a captivity in which the only contact with the outside world is a small gap in the room where they are locked. A short film made for the "Noite de Kino 2023" project of the São Paulo International Short Film Festival - Curta Kinoforum.

production_companies.name: CTR - Departamento de Cinema, Rádio e TV

title: What About Christmas?
overview: Travis Jr. is excited about Christmas because, for the first time, his family has a home. Travis wants Santa to bless his family with love and unity on Christmas Day. However, inner turmoil is preventing that from happening.
tagline: Urban Holiday Christmas Film

title: Shoot the Kuruvi
overview: The film starts by establishing the history of a don called Kuruvi Rajan, played by a convincing Arjai. Rajan rises to the top through hook and crook. Over time, he becomes a deadly villain, whose identity is known only by his victims. On the other hand, we are introduced to Sharif, who suffers from a terminal illness and wishes to tick items off his bucket list. How the two worlds meet forms the rest of the story.

title: The Reason Why
overview: In 1993, 16-year-old Hanit Kikos disappeared from Ofakim, Israel. A few days later, Suleiman al-Obeid Hoda was arrested, confessing that he raped and murdered her but gave conflicting confessions to investigators. 30 years after his imprisonment, the films with those involved in the affair shine a new light on the case.

production_companies.name: New Israeli Foundation for Cinema and Television

title: Hartheim : le château de l'horreur nazie
Crimes and Diamonds
overview: A failed diamond smuggling mission leads to multiple events of chaos.

title: Special Agent Tak: Part 2
overview: The young special agent tak finds himself in the base of the enemy and must fight his way out
tagline: He Works Alone

title: Deuces Wild
overview: A down-on-his-luck poker player gets wrapped up in a shady gambling syndicate. Faced with an ultimatum, he enlists the help of his friends in an attempt to pull off an improbable heist, settle his debt, and share in the score.
tagline: Place your bets.

title: Days in the 6IX
overview: Examines a group of young men in Toronto trying to find their way. Through lack of opportunity, they turn to life as a crime-however, problems arise such as money, relationships, and enemies.

title: The Peacock's Tale
overview: This group of guys from Pune are here to prove Martin Scorsese wrong. This is how every film is born in pre-production. Peacocks have never been sexier before.  Watch it before it gets banned.
tagline: AND PEOPLE SAY "CINEMA IS DEAD"

title: Eida Kopal!
overview: One night. One car drive. And Mehek's life turned upside down - forever.

title: Guy Gets Hit By A Truck FOR REAL
overview: On his way to a drug deal, a nervous man learns his lesson.
tagline: I heard it was that bomb ass dank ass.

title: The Origins of the Myth Discovery Association - 2
overview: Decently known actor and YouTuber Alan Kenton decides he wants to embark on a thrilling adventure with his newly founded Myth Discovery Association. As he dives into a series of mysterious investigations, audiences are treated to a captivating short film starring Kenton himself.
tagline: Never mention that place to me again!

title: Synks
overview: Stuck in a remote cabin, Ann & Natalie must defend themselves from disturbed intruders, coming from a nearby mental asylum. With no motive at all, they can and will kill anyone that gets in their way.
tagline: THEY DON'T CARE ABOUT THE SCARES, THEY CARE ABOUT FINISHING THE JOB

title: Rendezvous
overview: Calamity ensues beneath the silver screen when two bank robbers pick a small town movie theater as their drop-off location.

title: Aranam
overview: The Story is set up in a villageAranthangi, where a zamindar lives with his prodigal son Mayavan. The zamindaradopted two fraternity sons Kathir and Sakthi.Mayavan, who always fights withhis father to register the zameen house to his name, dies unexpectedly. Peoplebelieve that Mayavan's spirit haunt the house.After the death of mayavanzamindar registered the zameen house to his fraternity sons. The same nightzamindar dies suddenly in that house. By the time Kanagu who is close to theZameendar uses some witchcraft tricks to conquer the bungalow.Kathir comes to live in thebungalow with his newly married wife. As they were living happily together someparanormal things happen and questions like what is the reason for thosesupernaturals? What was the cause of zamindar's death? arose.Kathir finds answer to these andmany other unanswered questions along with his younger brother Sakthi, how theyunveil the mystery and recovers from it; is told in a horror thriller genre inan unpredictable form.

title: The Big Night
overview: A wannabe superhero causes more harm than he does good.

title: Big Score
overview: When a bank robbery doesn't go as planned, the  mastermind behind the heist must make a decision that will  change the outcome of her life.

title: Tough Heart
overview: A patriot risked his death to assassinate a Japanese staff officer, hiding the secret information of the Japanese army's military operations in Shanghai in the "Centennial Tai Sui", and the Zhang family father and daughter secretly sent the "Hundred Years Tai Sui" to Shanghai. When they arrived in Shanghai, the father and daughter of the Zhang family died mysteriously, and Qin Taisui, an apprentice in the theater class, was inadvertently involved in this murder case, and the "Hundred Years Taisui" fell into the hands of Shanghai gangster Zhuo Yifan and was auctioned at a high price. At the same time, Qin Taisui, who wanted to clear his grievances, began to investigate the truth of the matter, joined forces with the patriotic anti-Japanese secret organization, and fought fiercely with the Japanese secret agencies to recapture the secret military intelligence, and finally walked towards the bright road through the baptism of blood and fire.

title: Red Dusk
overview: Red Dusk, A Terror and Investigative Film. An Alshabab Terror Group Led by Hassan Hussein Carry out an ambush on Kenyan soil taking hostage 3 Kenyan Citizens. A Team of 3 Kenyan Black Opp Soildiers Are Assigned a task Carry out an Off The Books Rescue Mission Outside The Kenyan Borders Led By The Deputy Director Of National Security and Her Team.
tagline: No Playbook

title: Bad Sport: Footballgate
overview: Investigators detail shocking allegations that former Juventus director Luciano Moggi influenced referees in a scandal that rocked Italian football.

title: Martyr
overview: A gun-dealer starts to suspect his latest client is preparing a terrorist attack.

title: Grieve
overview: When an underground MMA fighter falls in love with a young woman who works for a drug lord, the drug lord uses the opportunity to make quick money, with tragic consequences.

title: Rules to Rule
overview: A colorful crew of professional thieves initiates the robbery of an Atlanta stash house, unaware that one of their own might not be what he seems.

title: Aggression within Underestmation
overview: Leonardo Leroux, a quiet bystander, watches a crime scene happen right before his eyes while being out and about as he explores more into the crime and the people within it. he gets himself wrapped in it while discovering a terrifying secret.

title: Varovasti sanoi rovasti
overview: A murder mystery set in the 1960s, following the footsteps of Poirot and Palmu, is a mix of suspense and comedy.

title: Red Rain
overview: A psychologically disturbed taxi driver navigates a surreal and dystopian nightmare.

title: Kaliyugam Pattanamlo
overview: The story revolves around identical twins, Vijay and Sagar. While Vijay leads a normal life, Sagar exhibits troubling behavior, leading to his placement in a mental rehabilitation center. Years later, Sagar remains unchanged, while Vijay becomes an engineering student.

title: Evoke
overview: Detectives Clarke Cain and John Abel investigate the murder of a young female.

title: Cookies N' Crime
overview: Two cops go undercover to take down a gang selling illegal cookies.
tagline: That's the way the Cookie Crumbles

title: An Andy Chapter
overview: Andy, an addict whose quitting journey has been feeble, faces the comically absurd and ends up finding support in unexpected places.
tagline: Just how weird can a bad day get?

title: A Quiet Afternoon
overview: U knows? They say that torment has been removed from the people of this cemetery, so why should you suffer? A story about the healing of a Paralyzed boy in a different form among the dead and his peace after sunset. Based on a true local story.
tagline: short film

title: One Way Out
overview: A teen who lives with his single mother struggles to keep up with rent when challenges arise. He settles for unorthodox ways of getting around to help his mother and in the process stumbles into a sticky situation.
tagline: How many ways out are there? One.

title: LA PETITE FILLE AUX PLANCHES À ROULETTES
Portrait of a Killer
overview: In the 1970s, a journalist who works for the most famous newspaper in his city becomes obsessed with one of the most dangerous killers of his time. When he decides to interview him to investigate his crimes, he realizes that the result of obsession can exceed the limits in the human being.
tagline: The Obsession From Parallel Perspectives

title: The Bomber
overview: A justice lawyer, for revenge, has become a mysterious bomber, even trying to change the society and practice political ideals with bombs. Would he eventually become a God or a Devil of the new era?
